subject: Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Horse Racing
Belmont Stakes
Big Brown (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: The Triple Crown has become a big deal, on the assumption that racing needs a new champion, but the prospect of this challenge going on for a few more decades is intriguing.
snippet: The Triple Crown has become a big deal, on the assumption that racing needs a new champion, but the prospect of this challenge going on for a few more decades is intriguing.
